form: During my exchange in Korea, I am looking forward to immersing myself in the rich and captivating Korean culture. I plan to delve into the vibrant world of K-pop and Korean entertainment, attending concerts and exploring the music scene. Additionally, I am excited to explore historical landmarks such as Gyeongbokgung Palace and gain a deeper understanding of Korea's fascinating history and architecture. Language learning will also be a priority, as I hope to take Korean language classes and practice my skills with native speakers. Lastly, I am eager to embark on adventures across the country, from the bustling streets of Seoul to the serene landscapes of Jeju Island, allowing me to witness the diverse beauty and experience the unique charm of each region. Overall, I anticipate an immersive and unforgettable journey filled with cultural discoveries, language development, and unforgettable memories.
